data.actual_result: The buttons are overlapped, potentially making it difficult to select one or the other.
data.short_description: [In Resolutions with a Width Less Than 1920] In 200% zoom, the bar at the very top is either missing buttons, or has overlapping buttons.
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure your resolution has a width lower than 1920 - Ensure Windows is on 100% zoom - Change Discord zoom to 200% - Go to friends tab - Notice how the tab up top is overlapping or missing buttons altogether.
